item.title: Harlow
item.description: Harlow Current leader of the Shepherds. Desperate to restore them to glory after Operation Hyena.

item.title: Shepherds
item.description: Shepherds Another well-known smuggling group. They rivaled the Jackals but were nearly snuffed out during Operation Hyena.

item.title: Kai
item.description: Kai A captain of the Prismatic Guard with poor Resilience in all Gem types but makes up for it through extreme dexterity and acumen.

item.title: Stoneshire
item.description: Stoneshire A Gem Family powerful enough to found the Trinity Kingdom.

item.title: Oberon
item.description: Oberon Combat medic of the Hellions.

item.title: Kade
item.description: Kade The twin brother of Axel, Kade is quick to enrage and has been involved in an innumerable number of fights because of it.

item.title: Artemis
item.description: Artemis Leader of the Hellions and known for her approach “take no shit, do all harm”.

item.title: Orion
item.description: Orion Sub-leader of the Hellions. Close to Artemis. Appearance large/tall asf Equipment [TODO] Shield Axe History [TODO] Temperament [TODO].

item.title: Thalen
item.description: Thalen Hails from the Shardlands; discovered compatibility w/ the Emerald gem type via fragments found in the Shardlands and began using this newfound ability to heal the less fortunate commonly found there; ultimately become frustrated w/ the lack of knowledge & resources, moved to the Trinity ...

item.title: Operation Hyena
item.description: Operation Hyena An operation carried out by the Arbiters of the Prismatic Guard guard to crush the smuggling groups of the Glowhollow in an effort to reduce illegal activity.
